author: _shemnon
content: Looks good, but I would recommend still building on a Java 11 LTS container if you set source compatability to 11.  There is a small chance new APIs in Java 18 may be used and then it won't run on Java 11.  The next LTS version is Java 17, same caveats.  For Java best practice is to build on your lowest version and run on your highest.
